Extension interface to Envir

Detailed Description

Classes in this group provide a plugin mechanism that can be used to customize the functionality of the Envir user interface library (and also Cmdenv and Tkenv, because they build on Envir).

To customize, subclass from the classes below, and select the new class in omnetpp.ini, using the rng-class=, outputvectormanager-class=, outputscalarmanager-class=, etc. config entries.
